name: Environmental Photographic Scene
description:
Overview

This project was made within 5 weeks. This includes a mood  board, blockout scene, asset creating, scene assembling and for me, learning new software. This project was all done in 5 weeks using unreal engine 5. Most assets was found on the unreal engine 5 marketplace hence why this project is free however some was created by me.

This project was created mainly just to create a scene for game design however, I had spent a bit of extra time to create a walkable scene that can be seen by you, the viewer of this project mainly to showcase a piece of work that was created instead of  hiding it.
 

Controls

W - Walks Forward
A - Walks Left
S - Walks Backwards
D - Walks Right
Spacebar - Jumping - Pressing spacebar twice will allow double jumping
Rotate to look around - Move Mouse
ESC - Quits Application
